Texts.Chs: 终极养蜂
Texts.Eng: Ultimate Beekeeping

Texts.Chs: 增强活力植物 I
Texts.Eng: Vitality-enhancing Plants I

Texts.Chs: 增强活力植物 II
Texts.Eng: Vitality-enhancing Plants II

Texts.Chs: 增强活力植物 III
Texts.Eng: Vitality-enhancing Plants III

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

一些植物原产于雷雨交加的世界，它们要么的抵抗电力，要么拥抱电力。你已经学会自己制造这些植物了。常茎的化合物让他们的消费者抵抗电力，而震撼蘑菇在被抛出时会爆发出电流。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

Some flora native to thunderstorm-heavy worlds either resist or possess electrical forces. You've learned to make those yourself. Compounds in Wubstem ground their consumer, while Shock-Shrooms explode in an electric burst when thrown.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

尽管宇宙中到处都是千奇百怪的植物，但大地守护团学院教会了你很多东西。你已经学会了在^orange;温室^reset;里为自己栽培这些植物，温室可以在你的^orange;加工台^reset;处制作。你也可以(粗略地)从植物中提取遗传物质，用于创造更复杂的植物在一个萌芽表，也是在你的机械加工表。小贴士: 种很多玉米！玉米在 Frackin 的宇宙中是非常有用的，它是油、牲畜饲料的来源，也是许多复杂植物的基础。
第一层你已经学会了如何建造一个觅食桌，这是一个投资农业追求和狩猎的地方。您还可以学习制作一些简单的农具和捕捉有用野生昆虫的方法。投资这棵树可以让你学会自己种植植物种子来种植食物或有用的植物，如何饲养农场动物，如何狩猎和捕鱼，先进的农业技术，以及如何饲养蜜蜂。
你已经学会了如何饲养农场动物，还设计了几个专门用来诱捕野生昆虫的橱柜。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned how to raise farm animals and also designed a few cabinets designed to lure and capture wild bugs.

Texts.Chs: 第一层: 你已经学会了狩猎-采集技能，比如捕捉、捕鱼和制造专门的武器，这些武器旨在最大限度地利用你杀死的东西中可用的材料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned hunter-gatherer skills like trapping, fishing and creating specialized weapons designed to maximize usable material from the things you kill.

Texts.Chs: 第一层你已经学会了一些更复杂的耕作方法，现在可以创建一些有用的耕作对象。生长托盘是其中最重要的一个，因为它可以自动生长种子放置在肥料的帮助下，增加产量远远超过手工劳动所能达到的。在你的加工工作台上加工它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned some more complex methods of farming and can now built several helpful farming objects. The ^cyan;Growing Tray^reset; is the most important of these, as it will automatically grow seeds placed inside with the help of fertilizers that increase yields far beyond what is possible through manual labor. Craft it at your ^orange;Machining Table^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 第一层你已经学会了创造一些简单的生存辅助工具-即便携式光源来帮助探索。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to create some simple survival aids - namely portable light sources to help with exploration.

Texts.Chs: 第一层: 你已经学会在蜂房里养蜜蜂，为你提供有用的资源。制作一个蜂房工艺站在您的加工桌上开始。饲养蜜蜂是相当复杂的。如果你不知道怎么做，可以从科学前哨的蜜蜂避难所购买一份向导，一旦你离开你的起始星球就可以到达。作为一个简单的入门技巧，您需要一个显微镜识别的蜂后、一个匹配的显微镜识别的雄蜂、一个或多个框架，以及在附近种植的一些花卉，以便开始生产。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've learned to raise bees in an apiary to provide you with useful resources. Make an ^cyan;Apiary Crafting Station^reset; at your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; to get started.

Raising bees is pretty complex. If you're not sure how, buy a guide from the Bee Refuge in the Science Outpost, accessible once you leave your starter planet.

As a simple starter tip, you need a microscope-identified queen, a matching microscope-identified drone, one or more frames, and some flowers planted nearby for production to start.

Texts.Chs: 二级钉子是一种很酷的植物，含铁量极其丰富，长出钉子形状的“果实” ，非常适合用作炸弹的弹片，还能生产可用的铁棒。你现在可以种植自己的品种了。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Nailery is a cool plant that, being extremely rich in iron content, grows nail-shaped 'fruit' which are perfect for using as shrapnel in a bomb and also produces workable iron bars. You are now able to grow your own strains of it.

Texts.Chs: 在许多在低温环境下茁壮成长的作物中，有些作物还赋予食用它们的人这种能力。你可以创造一些简单的植物，在寒冷的条件下保持你的温暖。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Of the many kind of crops that thrive in low temperature, some also confer this ability to people that eat them. You can create some simple plants that will keep you warm in chilly conditions.

Texts.Chs: 第二层萌芽表对你的喜好来说有点慢，所以你做了一个更复杂的电子版本。在你的自动装配机上工艺它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The sprouting table is a little slow for your liking, so you made a more complex electronic version. Craft it at your ^orange;Auto-Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你可以制作爆炸性的辣椒，可以像扔手榴弹一样扔出去。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can create (literally) explosively hot chili peppers that can be thrown like grenades.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你可以制造更大的蜜蜂养蜂场和更有用的蜂架来补充他们的产量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make bigger bee apiaries and more useful Frames to supplement their production.

Texts.Chs: 你可以制造更明亮，更好的灯光和一些先进的生存工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make brighter, better lights and a few advanced survival tools.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你可以制造更好的动物饲料和一些自动化设备来收集它们的产品，省去你的麻烦。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You can make even better animal feed and some automated devices to collect products from them, saving you the trouble.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你知道如何使用花卉生物发光体，可以创造各种发光蘑菇和方便的 Oonforta，可以像一个发光棒投掷照亮黑暗。你也可以创建 gazeleman，Oculemon 的一个奇怪的分支，让你的眼睛像泛光灯一样闪烁。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You know how to work with floral bioluminescence and can create varieties of Glowing Mushroom and the handy Oonforta, which can be thrown like a glowstick to light up darkness. You can also create the Gazelemon, a weird offshoot of the Oculemon which makes your eyes shine like floodlights.

Texts.Chs: 第二阶段你已经学到了很多关于植物营养的知识，可以让植物暂时提高你的健康和/或能量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned a lot about plant nutrition and can make plants that temporarily raise your maximum health and/or energy.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你已经学会了如何创造自己的快速生长藻类品种。藻类富含氮元素，是生物燃料的关键成分，如果你足够勇敢，你甚至可以吃掉它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned how to create your own strains of fast-growing algae. Rich in nitrogen, algae is a key component in biofuel, and you can even eat it if you're brave enough.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了如何培育能够激发消化它们的人的怒气的植物，从而增加战斗伤害的潜力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned how to produce plants that induce rage in whomever ingests them, increasing combat damage potential.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了从你的 Protectorage 知识中人为地创造更多的植物，包括至关重要的棉花，它将在制造盔甲、家具、时尚服装和养蜂设备中非常重要。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to artificially create several more plants from your Protectorage knowledge, including the all-important ^yellow;Cotton^reset; which will be very important in making armor, furniture, fashionable clothing and beekeeping equipment.

Texts.Chs: 第二阶段你已经学会了创造一些植物来增强你的机动性，或者当你摄入泥浆或重力雨时，能够抵抗它们的影响。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to create a few plants that enhance your mobility or grant resistance to slowing effects of mud or gravity-rain when ingested.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你已经学会了创造水培和空气培养管，更先进的洒水系统，和其他有用的农业增强。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to create hydroponic and aeroponic tubing, more advanced sprinkler systems, and other useful farming enhancements.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了种植一些来自卡达万星球的奇怪的阿维坎作物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to cultivate some weird Avikan crops originally from the planet Kadavan.

Texts.Chs: 第二层你已经学会了制造各种耐寒植物，这些植物可以增强你的防御能力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to make a variety of hardy plants that increase your defensive ability when consumed.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了制造基本的植物来对付有毒物质。迪奥达混合帮助您抵抗毒素有点。另一方面，Thornitox 不适合食用，但绝对适合杀人。它可以用来制造一些不错的武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to make basic plants that deal with poison. Dioda Hybrid helps you to resist poison somewhat. On the other hand, Thornitox isn't good for eating, but it's definitely good for killing. It can be used to create some nice weapons.

Texts.Chs: 你已经掌握了英格兰联邦-护国公时期学院教给你的所有植物，让你种植更多的粮食作物。你已经准备好开始制作各种各样的药用植物，它们不会提供饱腹感，但是不会破坏并且提供有用的爱好，比如增加的健康，环境抵抗力，治疗，或者武器化的收获。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've mastered all the plants the Protectorate Academy taught you about, allowing you to grow even more foodstuff plants. You're ready to start branching into making various medicinal plants that don't provide satiation, but don't spoil and provide useful buffs like increased health, environmental resistance, healing, or weaponizable harvests.

Texts.Chs: 你已经研究过具有治疗功能的植物，可以在温室里自己制作一些。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've studied plants with healing properties and can make a few of them for yourself in your greenhouse.

Texts.Chs: 第三层蕨类树木是棉花的下一个发展阶段，取而代之的是生长丝绸。既然你知道如何种植，那就值得你花时间种植一些。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Bracken Trees are the next step up from Cotton, growing Silk instead. It's worth your while to plant quite a few now that you know how.

Texts.Chs: 第三层把你的有毒植物知识运用到治疗植物上，你可以制造出更有效的治疗植物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

By applying your knowledge of poisonous plants to healing plants, you can make more potent healing plants.

Texts.Chs: 通过结合你对电力植物和与寒冷有关的植物的知识，你可以创造出更强有力的品种来抵御强烈的风暴。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

By combining your knowledge of electric and cold-related plants, you can create more potent strains that ward off severe storms.

Texts.Chs: 第三层“劲量花”是一种奇怪的圆形发光植物，可用能量极其丰富。原产于半影星球，它是夜星社会的常见燃料来源，也可以是你的燃料来源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Energiflower is a strange glowing orb-plant that is incredibly rich in usable energy. Originally native to Penumbral worlds, it is a common fuel source for Nightar societies and it can be one for you, too.

Texts.Chs: 钓鱼既是一种有用的生存技能，也是一种放松的爱好。你现在可以创造一个基本的钓鱼杆，并使用它来捕捉鱼在水体。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Fishing is both a useful survival skill and a relaxing hobby. You can now create a basic fishing rod and use it to catch fish in bodies of water.

Texts.Chs: 有些植物具有强烈的中和辐射的能力，所以你已经学会了自己培育它们。帕萨卡是一个有点比 Garp 浆果，但后者也包含微量稀有和非常有用的外星人化合物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Some plants have a highly-desired ability to neutralize radiation, so you've learned to breed them yourself. Pasaka is a bit more potent than Garp Berries, but the latter also contains trace amounts of rare and very useful Alien Compound.

Texts.Chs: 尽管晶体和金属是相当不同的，但生产它们的植物实际上是相当相关的。你可以种植树木，培育硅和类似西兰花的植物，这些植物可以产生晶体和一种半可食用的物质，保护你免受酸和毒素的伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Though crystals and metals are fairly dissimilar, growing plants that produce them is actually quite related. You can grow trees that cultivate Silicon and broccoli-like plants that produce Crystals and a semi-edible substance that protects you against acid and poison.

Texts.Chs: 保持你的农场动物健康和快乐的顶级装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Top of the line gear for keeping your farm animals healthy and happy.

Texts.Chs: 第三层: 你可以制作顶级的灯具和生存工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can craft top of the line lights and survival tools.

Texts.Chs: 第三层: 你可以制作一个电动生长托盘，当你使用电动生长托盘时，它的运行速度会更快。你可以在你的电子中心找到它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can make an electically-powered Growing Tray that operates much faster when powered. You can find it at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你可以制作更好的保护植物，极大地提高你的耐用性。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You can make even better protective plants that dramatically increase your durability.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经从增强生命力的植物分支出来，创造出更多特殊的植物，在更大程度上增强你的能量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've branched off from vitality-enhancing plants to create more specialized plants that enhance your energy, to a much greater degree.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经改进了你已经制造的能量增强植物，并且可以制造出更有效的植物，这些植物对你的健康和能量都有更大的影响。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon the power-enhancing plants you've already made and can make more potent plants that have greater effect and also increase your health or energy.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经改进了你的模型，甚至可以做出更好的属性提升植物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon your models and can make even better stat-boosting plants.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经学会了如何培育一些特殊的植物，以增强你在水中的流动性。你还培育了一些更奇特的植物，让你充满活力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned how to develop some specialized plants that enhance your mobility in water. You've also made some weirder plants that make you bouncy.

Texts.Chs: 第三层: 你已经学会了创造一些植物，这些植物在被摄入时能大大增强你的活动性。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to create a few plants that greatly enhance your mobility when ingested.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经学会了创造你自己的蓝绿乳菇，这是一种奇怪的植物，在阴暗的环境中茁壮成长，当你摄入的时候可以把这种属性转移给你。你还可以学习制作金蘑菇，这是一种特殊的蘑菇，除了具有生物发光性外，它自然也含有金。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to create your own Lactarius Indigo, which is a strange plant that thrives in shadowy environments and can transfer this property to you when ingested. You also learn to create Gold Shrooms, a special kind of mushroom which naturally contains gold in addition to being bioluminescent.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经学会了种植令人作呕但很有用的发光豆荚，这种豆荚是生物发光的，可以用来制造武器和盔甲。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to grow the icky-but-useful Blister Pods which are bioluminescent, and can be used in making weapons and armor.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经将你的指甲菌株进行突变，培育出两种新的植物: 一种是天然钨含量较高的锋利植物金箔树，另一种是叶片树，它们生长得更加锋利，天然钛含量较高。这两种农作物都能生产可用的金属，并生产出可以投掷的致命武器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've mutated your Nailery strain to cultivate two new plants: Tinselbush, a sharper plant which is naturally high in Tungsten, and Blade Trees, which grow even more sharp and are naturally high in Titanium. Both of these crops produce their metal in usable form and grow deadly throwable weapons.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经运用你的基因工程学知识，把一棵树的树干和另一棵树的叶子拼接成奇怪的组合形式。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've used your knowledge of genetic engineering to splice trees together into strange combined forms with the trunk of one tree and the leaves of another.

Texts.Chs: 第三层你已经在猎人采集战术上有了很大的改进，并且可以创造出比以前更有能力的猎人工具。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've vastly improved in hunter-gathering tactics and can create far more capable hunting tools than before.

Texts.Chs: 你用植物性毒素做的实验已经允许你创造你自己的高度抗毒植物，作为有用的解毒剂和毒素的无害化。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Your experimentation with plant-based toxins has allowed you to create your own highly poison-resistant plants that serve as useful antidotes and innoculations against toxins.

Texts.Chs: 在所有已知的植物中，Mutavisk 拥有最有用的纺织品。Mutavisk 丝绸非常耐用，对辐射的抵抗力令人难以置信，是制作有效的绷带和防辐射装置的理想材料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Of all known plants, the Mutavisk has the most useful textile. Mutavisk Silk is very durable and incredibly resistant to radiation, and it is ideal in making effective bandages and anti-radition gear.

Texts.Chs: 有些植物毒性很强，一般的植物学家都不会碰它们。另一方面，你可以轻而易举地处理它们，创造出产生剧毒可抛弃农产品的植物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Some plants are so toxic that no normal botanist would touch them. You, on the other hand, can handle them with ease, created plants that yield extremely toxic throwable produce.

Texts.Chs: 第四层坦率地说，你能给植物提供的营养数量是不真实的。你可以制造一些神奇的新植物，将你的表现提高到新的水平。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

The amount of nutrients you can pack into a plant is quite frankly, unreal. You can make some fantastic new plants that improve your performance to new levels.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 这些在任何体育赛事中都绝对是非法的。有了这些提高运动成绩的超级植物，你就能跑得非常非常快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

These would definitely be illegal in any sporting event. With these performance-enhancing super-plants, you'll be able to run very, very fast.

Texts.Chs: 第4层使用你对辐射植物的知识，你现在可以创建你自己的辐射草植物，它会在摄入的时候过滤掉甚至是最致命的辐射。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using your knowledge of radiation plants, you can now create your own Rad Grass plants which will, upon ingestion, filter out even the most lethal kinds of radiation for a while.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 你可以制作质量更好的钓具，让你更轻松地捕鱼。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can craft better quality fishing tackle, enabling you to catch fish with greater ease.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 你可以培育更热的植物，这些植物的果实含有岩浆而不是果汁，这些植物可以长时间保护你免受高温的伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make even hotter plants whose fruit contain magma instead of fruit juice, and ones that protect you from extreme heat for a very long time.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你可以制造更强大的框架，极大地提高蜜蜂的效率。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can make even more powerful Frames that drastically improve your bees' efficiency.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你现在可以创造一些奇怪的植物，它们会把你包裹在伤害之外——反射出来的刺，会给任何伤害你的东西带来很多痛苦。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You can now create some weird plants that coat you in damage-reflecting thorns, causing lots of pain to whatever just hurt you.

Texts.Chs: 第四层: 你已经掌握了植物在寒冷中的生存技能。你可以让植物保持你的体温，即使是在零度以下的北极荒地。更妙的是，你可以把这种感冒武器化对付你的敌人。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've attained mastery over plants that live in the cold. You can make plants that maintain your body temperature even in subzero arctic wastelands. Even better, you can weaponize that cold against your foes.

Texts.Chs: 你已经非常擅长制造保护性植物，可以制造最好的防御增强植物。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've gotten very good at making protective plants and can make the best defense-enhancing plants around.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你已经进一步改进了你的异种实验室设计。你的新高级异种实验室工作得非常快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've improved even further on your Xenolab design. Your new ^cyan;Advanced Xenolab^reset; works incredibly fast.

Texts.Chs: 你已经学会了创造植物来利用宇宙能量，保护你免受它的伤害，或者在你濒临死亡时将你传送到遥远的地方。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned to create plants that harness cosmic energy, protecting you from it or teleporting you far away when you are near death.

Texts.Chs: 你已经掌握了狩猎-采集战术，可以制造顶级的狩猎装备。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've mastered hunter-gatherer tactics and can make top-shelf hunting gear.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你已经掌握了创造治愈植物的艺术。你现在可以创造弗洛拉雷特，一种类似棉花糖的植物，可以快速无痛地治愈甚至是严重的伤害。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've mastered the art of creating healing plants. You can now create Floralyt, a cotton candy-like plant that quickly and painlessly cures even grevious injuries.

Texts.Chs: 第四层你已经把你的植物营养知识运用到一些高端饱食植物的创造中。烟碱豆很难种植，但是味道很好，因此是一种很好的经济作物。科维克斯有点恶心，但是有药用价值，并且对牛饲料有很好的添加作用——它的酶可以让任何吃它的人快速有效地代谢血液，给予吸血鬼的攻击。最后，你还学会了制作一种可以长出美味肉片的植物，因为为什么不呢？肉是美味的，从植物中培养比从动物中培养更有效率。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've put your knowledge of plant nutrition to work in the creation of some high-end satiation plants. Neonmeleon is hard to grow, but delicious, therefore making a great cash crop. Corvex is a bit gross, but has medicinal properties and makes a great addition to cattle feed - and its enzymes allow whomever eats it to metabolize blood quickly and efficiently, granting 'vampiric' attacks. Finally, you also learned to make a plant that grows delicious slabs of meat, because why not? Meat is delicious, and growing it from a plant is way more efficient than from an animal.

Texts.Chs: 你已经用你的植物毒药知识增强了致命毒药震颤蘑菇。把它扔给那些怀疑你的技能的人，然后去看焰火表演。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've used your knowledge of botanical poisons to enhance the Shock-Shroom with deadly poison. Toss it at people who doubt your skill and watch the fireworks.

Texts.Chs: 你在植物学方面的技能可以让你制造出一些强大得离谱的植物，让你的能量达到疯狂的水平，让你比任何正常人都能持续攻击更长的时间。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Your skill in botany allows you to make some ridiculously potent plants that boost your energy to insane levels, letting you continue attacking for much longer than any normal person could.

Texts.Chs: 第5层卢米维尼是已知的仅有的生长在气态巨型植物之一。它非常受欢迎，因为它的果实可以让身体在类似的条件下自我调节。利用你对植物学的精通，你可以用这种神奇的植物培育出你自己的品种。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Lumivine is one of the only known plants that grows in gas giants. It's highly sought after, because its fruit allows the body to regulate itself in similar conditions. Using your mastery of botany, you can make your own strains of this wonder-plant.

Texts.Chs: 第五层 Aenema 植物灼热的花瓣中充满了有用的阴影气体，等待被提取。现在您可以培养您自己的 Aenema，您将很容易获得这种资源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The searing hot petals of the Aenema plant are packed with useful Shadow Gas just waiting to be extracted. Now that you can cultivate your own Aenema, you will have easy access to that resource.

Texts.Chs: 第五层的沃里特是有史以来最奇怪的植物之一，但是经过大量的研究，你现在知道如何自己制作了。它是一种奇怪的胶状物，摄入后会在肺部凝结，让你在水下正常呼吸，甚至在真空中呼吸一段时间，然后无害地通过你的系统。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Vorit is one of the weirdest plants ever, but you know how to make your own now after much study. A weird jelly that congeals in the lungs when ingested, it allows you to breathe normally underwater or even in the vacuum of space for a while, then harmlessly passes through your system.

Texts.Chs: 第5层与你的知识捕鱼，你可以创造一个近乎完美的钓竿。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

With your knowledge of fishing, you can create a nearly perfect fishing rod.

Texts.Chs: 第5层你可以制作高级的框架，大大改善你的蜂巢。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You can make advanced Frames that drastically improve your hives.

Texts.Chs: 第5层你对战斗增强植物了解不少，可以制造一些超强的品种，这些品种只能勉强安全使用... ... 但绝对不适用于你的敌人。特别强大的 Vashta 也可用于某些武器制造。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You know quite a bit about combat-enhancing plants and can make some super-strong varieties that are only just barely safe to use... but definitely not for your enemies. The especially potent Vashta can also be used in some weapon creation.

Texts.Chs: 你是蘑菇的大师，你可以培养能够释放出一种能够抵御厄奇乌斯鬼魂的菌类。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

You're a master of mushrooms. You can cultivate fungi that emit a pheremone that wards off Erchius Ghosts.

Texts.Chs: 第六层使用量子流体的特性，你可以让植物以植物的方式生长远古精华。本质是非常有用的升级武器在古老的工作站。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Using the properties of Quantum Fluid, you are able to make a plant that grows Ancient Essence botanically. Essence is very useful for upgrading weapons at ancient workstations.

Texts.Chs: 第六层: 你获得了一个真正令人羡慕的硕士学位，你成功地让你的蜂巢高效地生产。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You have achieved a truly enviable master's degree. You have managed to make your hives produce efficiently.

Texts.Chs: 第6层你对植物学的掌握使你能够培育出两种令人敬畏的植物，这两种植物都能抵御负面的精神影响。除此之外，反光大道将极大地提高你的伤害输出，暗光花将允许你看到红外线，抵消黑色星球周围行星上的压迫性黑暗。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Your mastery of botany has allowed you to make two awesome plants which both ward off negative mental influences. In addition, Glarestalk will massively improve your damage output and Darklight flowers will allow you to see in infared, negating the oppressive darkness found on planets around Black Stars.
